content:
Hello Guys!!!
I am Mayank, second year undergraduates's student from India. I would like to work on Online Geometry Viewer Back-end for GSoC 2018.
I am looking forward to contribute to the organization and so can you please provide me the guidance to start contributing.
Thanks
@Mayank guidance would be to do a lot of independent research so you understand fully what is needed
Welcome Mayank, looking forward to your participation :)
Welcome @Mayank, any progress on OGV so far?
